text: I wish I could go backI grew up in poverty thanks to my Dad dying when I was   He was also a paranoid schizophrenic and alcoholic  so my earliest memories are all kinds of messed up  One time  after my parents separated  he tried to violently break into our house during my  th birthday party    I feel like honestly I could have handled the memories  and the poverty  if I just could have gotten my teeth fixed at the time everyone else does  I had extremely messed up teeth  I had still had three baby teeth into adulthood and one was perpetually loose  My two front teeth had a massive gap in between them and were misshapen  One of my canine teeth was in the wrong spot  and pushed against my upper lip and the other was stuck in the roof my mouth  They were like that until I finally got them fixed at   which required me to have braces as an adult I m realizing how much that held me back socially and romantically now  and while things picked up for me after I got them fixed  I then was held back by the fact I was so far behind in so many ways   It sounds trivial but just that one thing  having my teeth fixed  I can see giving me just enough of a boost that I wouldn t be where I today  which is being at the point I just don t want to live  I never thought I d actually end up not wanting to live  and if I did  I never realized just how fucking awful you have to feel to reach that point  To actually look into methods to stop your body from living because what s going on in your brain is just that painful  but here I am I give myself maybe one more month  It s been nearly a year of this so far and I still haven t found a way  or a reason to live anymore
summary: I grew up in poverty thanks to my Dad dying when I was. He was also a paranoid schizophrenic and alcoholic. He tried to break into our house during my birthday party. I wish I could have gotten my teeth fixed at the time everyone else does.
cleaned: grow poverty thank dad die paranoid schizophrenic alcoholic try break house birthday party wish get tooth fix time
